name: New Game Informer Dark [WIP]
description: Dark Mode/Turn Out the Lights theme for the June 2018 Game Informer site update.
additional_info:
When Game Informer updated their site to work better across all platforms, they got rid of their optional dark mode. This is a WIP attempt to restore dark mode with the new site layout.

Currently Not working (Let me know if I missed anything!):
- Header Logo: Logo is still black in header. Planning to replace it with the white one from the footer, but I cannot isolate where to change it in the CSS.
- Monthly Feature Hub Pages: Navigation to the game "hubs" looks fine, but the hub pages themselves are totally broken. They seem to have lots of custom CSS. No idea how to fix.

HEADS UP: Comment sections will still have a light theme since they are run through Disqus, and cannot be themed through Gameinformer. I suggest using a Disqus.com dark theme in tandem with this. It will look fine that way.
